data.title: Why are North Africans mostly white and not black as other African countries?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 20): Why are North Africans mostly white and not black as other African countries? They are lighter but arguably not white. But there is 2 reasons for the change in appearance; TV / the Media, and population shift / admixture:
